Package cpsc2150.extendedConnectX.models

Interface IGameBoard

public interface IGameBoard
IGameBoard defines a game board of characters to play Connect X. (0,0) represents the bottom left corner of the game board.

    • checkIfFree

      default boolean checkIfFree(int c)
      Returns a boolean indicating whether a column is free or full of tokens
      Parameters:
      c - integer of the column index of the board that will be checked
      Returns:
      boolean indicating if the column is free

    • dropToken

      void dropToken(char p, int c)
      Drops a players token into a column in the game board based on which player they are
      Parameters:
      p - character representing the player's token to be dropped in the column
      c - integer represnting the column where the token will be dropped

    • checkForWin

      default boolean checkForWin(int c)
      Returns a boolean indicating whether the player who just placed a token has won or not
      Parameters:
      c - integer representing the column to be checked for a win
      Returns:
      boolean indicating if the player who just played has won the game

    • checkTie

      default boolean checkTie()
      Returns a boolean indicating whether or not the game has ended in a tie
      Returns:
      boolean indicating whether or not a tie has occurred, which results when all columns are full

    • checkHorizWin

      default boolean checkHorizWin(cpsc2150.extendedConnectX.models.BoardPosition pos, char p)
      Returns a boolean indicating whether a player has won in the horizontal direction
      Parameters:
      pos - BoardPosition object that is represents the position to check for the win
      p - a character that shows which player's tokens to look for
      Returns:
      true or false depending on if there is winning_number_of_tokens in a row horizontally

    • checkVertWin

      default boolean checkVertWin(cpsc2150.extendedConnectX.models.BoardPosition pos, char p)
      Returns a boolean indicating whether a player has won in the vertical direction
      Parameters:
      pos - BoardPosition object that is represents the position to check for the win
      p - a character that shows which player's tokens to look for
      Returns:
      true or false depending on if there is winning_number_of_tokens in a row vertically

    • checkDiagWin

      default boolean checkDiagWin(cpsc2150.extendedConnectX.models.BoardPosition pos, char p)
      Returns a boolean indicating whether a player has won in the diagonal direction
      Parameters:
      pos - BoardPosition object that is represents the position to check for the win
      p - a character that shows which player's tokens to look for
      Returns:
      true or false depending on if there is winning_number_of_tokens in a row diagonally

    • whatsAtPos

      char whatsAtPos(cpsc2150.extendedConnectX.models.BoardPosition pos)
      checks the GameBoard at an specifc position to see what is contained
      Parameters:
      pos - BoardPosition object that indicates the position of the board to check
      Returns:
      One of the players' selected tokens, or a blank space

    • isPlayerAtPos

      default boolean isPlayerAtPos(cpsc2150.extendedConnectX.models.BoardPosition pos, char player)
      checks the Gameboard at a specific position to see if a player has a token at this board position
      Parameters:
      pos - BoardPosition object that is used to locate the position that is being checked
      player - char that specifies which player the board will be checked for
      Returns:
      true if the specified player token is at the position, and false otherwise
